25 
26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_HALF_EDGE_STRUCTURE_MESH_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_HALF_EDGE_STRUCTURE_MESH_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include <reactphysics3d/mathematics/mathematics.h>
31 
32 namespace reactphysics3d {
33 
34 // Class HalfEdgeStructure
40 class HalfEdgeStructure {
41 
42  public:
43 
44  using VerticesPair = Pair<uint32, uint32>;
45 
47  struct Edge {
48  uint32 vertexIndex; // Index of the vertex at the beginning of the edge
49  uint32 twinEdgeIndex; // Index of the twin edge
50  uint32 faceIndex; // Adjacent face index of the edge
51  uint32 nextEdgeIndex; // Index of the next edge
52  };
53 
55  struct Face {
56  uint32 edgeIndex; // Index of an half-edge of the face
57  Array<uint32> faceVertices; // Index of the vertices of the face
58 
60  Face(MemoryAllocator& allocator) : edgeIndex(0), faceVertices(allocator) {}
61 
63  Face(Array<uint32> vertices) : edgeIndex(0), faceVertices(vertices) {}
64  };
65 
67  struct Vertex {
68  uint32 vertexPointIndex; // Index of the vertex point in the origin vertex array
69  uint32 edgeIndex; // Index of one edge emanting from this vertex
70 
72  Vertex(uint32 vertexCoordsIndex) : vertexPointIndex(vertexCoordsIndex), edgeIndex(0) { }
73  };
74 
75  private:
76 
78  MemoryAllocator& mAllocator;
79 
81  Array<Face> mFaces;
82 
84  Array<Vertex> mVertices;
85 
87  Array<Edge> mEdges;
88 
89  public:
90 
92  HalfEdgeStructure(MemoryAllocator& allocator, uint32 facesCapacity, uint32 verticesCapacity,
93  uint32 edgesCapacity) :mAllocator(allocator), mFaces(allocator, facesCapacity),
94  mVertices(allocator, verticesCapacity), mEdges(allocator, edgesCapacity) {}
95 
97  ~HalfEdgeStructure() = default;
98 
100  void init();
101 
103  uint32 addVertex(uint32 vertexPointIndex);
104 
106  void addFace(Array<uint32> faceVertices);
107 
109  uint32 getNbFaces() const;
110 
112  uint32 getNbHalfEdges() const;
113 
115  uint32 getNbVertices() const;
116 
118  const Face& getFace(uint32 index) const;
119 
121  const Edge& getHalfEdge(uint32 index) const;
122 
124  const Vertex& getVertex(uint32 index) const;
125 
126 };
127 
128 // Add a vertex
132 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 HalfEdgeStructure::addVertex(uint32 vertexPointIndex) {
133  Vertex vertex(vertexPointIndex);
134  mVertices.add(vertex);
135  return static_cast<uint32>(mVertices.size()) - 1;
136 }
137 
138 // Add a face
143 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void HalfEdgeStructure::addFace(Array<uint32> faceVertices) {
144 
145  // Create a new face
146  Face face(faceVertices);
147  mFaces.add(face);
148 }
149 
150 // Return the number of faces
154 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 HalfEdgeStructure::getNbFaces() const {
155  return static_cast<uint32>(mFaces.size());
156 }
157 
158 // Return the number of edges
162 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 HalfEdgeStructure::getNbHalfEdges() const {
163  return static_cast<uint32>(mEdges.size());
164 }
165 
166 // Return the number of vertices
170 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 HalfEdgeStructure::getNbVertices() const {
171  return static_cast<uint32>(mVertices.size());
172 }
173 
174 // Return a given face
178 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const HalfEdgeStructure::Face& HalfEdgeStructure::getFace(uint32 index) const {
179  assert(index < mFaces.size());
180  return mFaces[index];
181 }
182 
183 // Return a given edge
187 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const HalfEdgeStructure::Edge& HalfEdgeStructure::getHalfEdge(uint32 index) const {
188  assert(index < mEdges.size());
189  return mEdges[index];
190 }
191 
192 // Return a given vertex
196 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const HalfEdgeStructure::Vertex& HalfEdgeStructure::getVertex(uint32 index) const {
197  assert(index < mVertices.size());
198  return mVertices[index];
199 }
200 
201 }
202 
203 #endif
204
